pullRequest.title: [systemtest] Fix failing tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Lukas Kral lkral@redhat.com
Type of change

Bugfix

Description
This PR will fix these tests:
ConnectS2IST#testDeployS2IAndKafkaConnectorWithMongoDBPlugin - bad name of connector by my mistake
ConnectS2IST#testSecretsWithKafkaConnectS2IWithTlsAndScramShaAuthentication - applying NP
ConnectST#testCustomAndUpdatedValues - remove check for log, add check for env value in pod
MirrorMaker2ST#testMirrorMaker2TlsAndScramSha512Auth - some unexpected behaviour - topic created after deploy of MM2 and be mirrored have random timeout
MirrorMakerST#testCustomAndUpdatedValues - remove check for log, add check for env value in pod - future fix
HttpBridgeST#testCustomAndUpdatedValues - remove check for log, add check for env value in pod - future fix

Checklist

 Make sure all tests pass

nodes.bodyText: This should be in test, not in utils class
